newsitem.title: UK: Brent cargo trades down at Nov -8 cts - trade.
newsitem.headline: Brent cargo trades down at Nov -8 cts - trade.

text.p: A cargo of Brent crude loading in the October 10-12 range sold between refiners on Monday at November Brent -8 cents, traders said.
On Friday another cargo traded at November Brent +6 cents.
"The Brent market is in the doldrums and the others (North Sea sweet crudes) will have to follow," a physical trader said.
British Petroleum, who still hold four October Brent cargoes, sold the cargo to Shell U.K.
